      • withDraw

        public void withDraw(double amount)
              throws LowBalanceException
        Method to withdraw some amount Checks is zero balance if not debit the amount from current balance modify the available balance accordingly
        Parameters:
        double - amount to be withdrawn
        Throws:
        LowBalanceException - if the balance is zero or if the amount specified is more than the available balance
